snippet: The Sunlight Foundation found that less than 1 percent of the comments about net neutrality sent to the F.C.C. were clearly opposed to net neutrality.
abstract: The Sunlight Foundation found that less than 1 percent of the comments about net neutrality sent to the F.C.C. were clearly opposed to net neutrality.

headline.main: Net Neutrality Comments to F.C.C. Overwhelmingly One-Sided, Study Says
